Text: this is the opposite of a dud, pal! perhaps you could include the tracklist in the description next month, or is it supposed to be a surprise?

Hey! Thanks for the comment, Criznittle. I don't include a tracklist in the description because you can click on the number next to 
Files:
In this torrent, it's the number 77. 
right up above on the left. If you clik on it it gives a full file list. It's glitchy sometimes and slow but it works. It seemed like overkill to print it in the description too.
Thanks for the comment and again it's GREAT to have you back.
